item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, token refresh, and logout

exec: const timestamp = Date.now();
const testEmail = 'testuser' + timestamp + '@example.com';
pm.collectionVariables.set('testEmail', testEmail);
pm.test('Status code is 201', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(201); });

pm.test('Response has access token', function () { const jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData).to.have.property('accessToken'); pm.collectionVariables.set('accessToken', jsonData.accessToken); });

pm.test('Response has refresh token', function () { const jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData).to.have.property('refreshToken'); pm.collectionVariables.set('refreshToken', jsonData.refreshToken); });
pm.test('Response has token type Bearer', function () { const jsonData = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(jsonData.tokenType).to.eql('Bearer'); });
